member.name: ITfLangBarItemBalloon.GetBalloonInfo
member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives the information about the balloon.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfLangBarItemBalloon.GetPreferredSize
member.summary: Obtains the preferred size,in pixels, of the balloon.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that contains the default size, in pixels, of the balloon.
Pointer to a SIZE structure that receives the preferred balloon size, in pixels. The cy member of this structure is ignored.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfLangBarItemBalloon.OnClick
member.param: Contains one of the values that indicate which mouse button was used to click the balloon.
Pointer to a structure that contains the position of the mouse cursor, in screen coordinates, at the time of the click event.
Pointer to a structure that contains the bounding rectangle, in screen coordinates, of the balloon.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfLangBarItemBalloon interface is implemented by an application or text service and is used by the language bar manager to obtain information specific to a balloon item on the language bar.
The language bar manager obtains an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the passed to with IID_ITfLangBarItemBalloon.
